passages.title: Beginnings
passages.content:
{N}To continue, click anywhere on the screen
{N}You find yourself standing in front of a dilapidated, old haunted house. The wind howls eerily, and the moon casts long shadows on the creaky porch.
{E}Greetings, adventurer. Will you dare to enter?

passages.title: Dark Foyer
passages.content:
{N}As you step inside, the musty air fills your nostrils. A flickering candle on a dusty table illuminates a dimly lit foyer.
{E}Welcome, traveler. Your journey begins here. First you will have to prove yourself in combat
{P}Combat??? what do you mean combat?

passages.title: Glowing Passage
passages.content:
{N}You follow the soft glow of the candle down a narrow passage. The walls are covered in cobwebs, and the floorboards creak beneath your feet.
{E}Intriguing, isn't it? What will you do next?

passages.title: Dusty Library
passages.content:
{N}You enter a dusty library, filled with ancient tomes and tattered scrolls. The shelves tower above you, their contents shrouded in mystery.
{E}Books hold knowledge untold. What shall you explore?

passages.title: The Forbidden Tome
passages.content:
{N}You carefully open the ancient book, its pages brittle with age. Strange symbols and incantations fill the worn parchment.
{E}Ancient secrets lie within. Choose your path.

passages.title: Unleashing Chaos
passages.content:
{N}As you recite the forbidden words, an ominous energy fills the room. Shadows dance and swirl, and a vortex of darkness materializes.
{E}Foolish mortal, you've awakened me. Prepare for your demise.
{P}What have I done?!

passages.title: The Final Confrontation
passages.content:
{N}With courage in your heart, you face the dark entity head-on. The battle rages, your every move determined to banish the evil that lurks within.
{E}Your bravery impresses me. But will it be enough?
{P}I will not falter!

passages.title: Triumph of Light
passages.content:
{N}Your spell radiates with brilliant light, engulfing the dark entity. It shrieks in agony, its form dissipating into nothingness.
{E}The darkness is vanquished, and the haunted house is at peace once more.
{N}Congratulations, hero. You have triumphed!

passages.title: Courtyard
passages.content:
{N}You step into a moonlit courtyard, adorned with overgrown vines and statues of forgotten souls. A sense of tranquility fills the air.
{E}The spirits here are restless. How will you proceed?

passages.title: Enigmatic Statues
passages.content:
{N}As you approach the statues, their eyes seem to follow your every move. Symbols etched into their pedestals hold a cryptic message.
{E}The past whispers its secrets. What will you decipher?
{N}Remeber thought that symbols are deadly.
